name: Season of 12 Colors
description: --The way it was, Just like it is now, On a bright, bright summer day. "That's a promise, right?" The girl in a white dress said. Sunny sky. A paper plane slid across it, riding on blue winds.
minimum_requirements: OS: WIN7 SP1/WIN8/WIN10 Processor: 1000MHz Memory: 512 MB RAM Graphics: OpenGL 2.0 Storage: 200 MB available space

reviews.review_text: If you think this is yet another cheap boring visual novel and decide to give a bad review, I strongly advise you to MAKE SURE you have read the decode story.  The game greatly exceeds my expectations with this price, especially the short but subtle storyline, together with the awesome art work and soothing sound tracks. Play nice on linux. A definitely 10/10.  ============  致中文玩家：  买  ============  致开发者，关于系统的一些小的建议：   点击新游戏后没有再次返回主菜单的选项；   语言选择简体中文的时候很多菜单界面都是繁体中文的；   想看回想的时候习惯性地使用鼠标滚轮，发现鼠标滚轮无论向上滚还是向下滚都是回滚的效果；   建议能在新的章节出现的时候适度高亮新章节的飞机做为提醒，虽然大家应该都是一次性通关的？  祝好！

I first wanted this because it looked cute, but after playing, I can really feel the story  The story is very touching and its worth the price, despite it being short Also, the backgrounds look awesome \o/

This is my first visual novel and has become an instant favorite. As the story progresses you will start to notice the subtle details you may have disregarded in the beginning. If you decide to check it out make sure you read through the 'Decode' story after the main one to get a better grasp on what the story is actually about. Remember, the story isn't finished until you've unlocked all the achievements! I look forward to the next chapter!
It's a very good game with a impressive story. Unfortunately, the software has bug such as cannot exit and the mouse focus. But it also worth to buy if u like to see a simple and moving story.

There isn't anything that stood out a lot, the story was just quite a simple heart warming story, it isn't something that will move a lot of people into tears. But it's exactly what its relaxing style that caught me.

i'm not that into visual novels but i really enjoyed this! i love the story and the music and art is so pretty. just a warning though. the story is kinda confusing at a few parts but its not too bad. also the voices i thought was kinda annoying cause it sounds very forced but theres not alot of real voices so i didnt mind to much. for the price i didnt expect much from it but its very good! i would recommend.  it takes about 2-3 hours to finish  sorry if this isnt helpful this is the first review ive ever done so i dont really know how to do this.

Season of 12 Colors is a Chinese visual novel that really maximizes the use of the medium to tell its story. The art is lovely, the story is thoughtful and moving, and the music is good, though a bit repetitive. The voice-acting sounds good, though since it is in Chinese I really can't say much about it. The English translation is a bit spotty at times, but it's usually pretty easy to figure out what is going on.  The full experience should take about 2 hours; I'd definitely recommend doing it in one go.  Make sure to read everything !
